label: Should be declared with property the same name used in 'group_id' in client/locales/pt-en.json inside descriptor_labels.groups.'group_id'.label_group

layers.label: Should be declared with property the same name used in 'general_layer_id' in client/locales/pt-en.json inside descriptor_labels.groups.'group_id'.layers.'id'.label_layer
layers.selectedType: Name of the selected layertype, should be the same of the Mapserver layer

types.value_type: Name of the layer in Mapserver
types.type: Declare type of group layer: 'layer', 'basemap' or 'limit'. Default: 'layer'
types.typeLayer: Declare type of Layer: vectorial or raster
types.viewValueType: Can be directly assigned (Ex. 'Planet'), or inform 'translate' which should be declared with property the same name used in 'value' in client/locales/pt-en.json inside descriptor_labels.groups.'group_id'.layers.'id'.label_layer.types.'value'.viewValueType.
types.typeLabel: Label of Type in Layer. Values: 'type', 'quantity', 'source', 'area_planted', 'production'
types.filterLabel: Label of filter in Layer. Values: 'type', 'quantity', 'source', 'area_planted', 'production'
types.columnsCSV: List of csv Columns to export.
types.filterSelected: value of array of filters selected.

filters.value_filter: filter applied in the layer. Ex 'year=2020'
filters.viewValueFilter: Show direct value or inform 'translate' to search in labels.layertype[layer_value].filter[filter_value].Viewvalue
